description: 以深入淺出的方式使同學了解財務管理的基本概念,進而應用於實務。

syllabus.zh:
1. 財務管理導論
2. 貨幣的時間價值
3. 認識財務報表
4. 風險、報酬與投資組合
5. 證券評價
6. 資金成本
7. 資本預算
8. 資本結構
9. 股利政策
10. 財務規劃與預測
11. 營運資金管理
syllabus.en:
1. Introduction to Financial Management
2. The Time Value of Money
3. Introduction to Finacial Statement
4. Risk,Return and Portfolio
5. Valuing Bonds
6. The Cost of Capital
7. Capital Budgeting
8. Capital Structure
9. Dividend Policy
10. Financial Planning and Forecasting
11. Working Capital Management

weeklySchedule:
Week 1 The Introduction of Financial Management
Week 2 The Analysis of Financial statements part I
Week 3 The Analysis of Financial statements part II
Week 4 The Financial Planning part I
Week 5 The Financial Planning part II
Week 6 The Time Value of Currency
Week 7 The Evaluation of Securities part I
Week 8 The Evaluation of Securities part II
Week 9 The Mid-term Exam
Week 10 The Expected Rate of Return & The Risk Evaluation
Week 11 The Correlation of 2 Assets
Week 12 The Portfolio part I
Week 13 The Portfolio part II
Week 14 The Portfolio part III
Week 15 The Capital Budgeting Decision part I
Week 16 The Capital Budgeting Decision part II
Week 17 The Capital Budgeting Decision part III
Week 18 The Final Exam

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 讓學生學習財務管理的基本觀念，以建立財務管理的基礎
讓學生了解報酬與風險的相關性，以建立財務投資的正確觀念
從認識財務報表中思考如何執行企業診斷
讓學生學會財務預測、營運資金管理完成財務規劃
利用資本預算與投資專案分析，以加強投資與財務決策的能力
